welcome_message_body: Welcome to Florencio Varela, Argentina! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Florencio Varela has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Donnata
restaurants.description: Donnata is a pizzeria located in Florencio Varela.
restaurants.address: Bartolomé Mitre 294 (Alberdi), 1888 Florencio Varela, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Burger King
restaurants.description: Burger King is a fast food restaurant located in San Francisco Solano.
restaurants.address: Av. 844 Nº 2653 (e/ Madre T. de Calcuta y Av. F. Provincial), B1881 San Francisco Solano, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Sol Dorado
restaurants.description: Sol Dorado is a bakery located in Partido de Quilmes.
restaurants.address: Av Oscar Smith 2200, 1882 Ezpeleta Oeste, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: El Amanecer
restaurants.description: El Amanecer is a argentinian restaurant located in Berazategui.
restaurants.address: Camino Gral. Manuel Belgrano 2049 (e/ Calle 20 y Av. 21), B1884MIS Berazategui, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Estancia Calchaqui
restaurants.description: Estancia Calchaqui is a bbq joint located in Quilmes.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Plata Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at La Plata Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
